data.description: Find text strings in SWF (Flash) files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a simple module intended to be used by "search engine"
    authors for the purpose of extracting text strings from Macromedia
    Flash SWF files. While a developer could use the full SWF Parsing
    modules available and write extensions to detect and pull out
    strings, this module provides a solution that is lightweight, with a
    very simple interface. It is intended for those who just want it to
    go, and don't care to muck about with SWF internals.
